Package it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.effects

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Effect
    The Effect interface gives a common method for all different effects to be used by a card.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAmmo
    This effect adds ammo to the curent player of an amout specified by the ammoToAdd parameter.
    AddPowerUp
    This effect gives a powerUp to the current player.
    AddPowerUpTest  
    AmmoTest  
    ConsumeAmmo
    This effect consumes the indicated ammo from the current player.
    ConsumeTargetedAmmo
    This effect consumes only one indicated targeted ammo.
    Damage
    This abstract class deals with damage calculation on players.
    DamageRoom
    This effect damages a whole room with the indicated damage amount.
    DamageRoomTest  
    DamageTargetList
    This effect deals damage to a player target list.
    DamageTargetListTest  
    DamageTargetsAtDistance
    This effect damages all players at the indicated distance.
    DamageTile
    This effect damages all the players in the indicated tile.
    DamageTileList
    This effect damages all the targets contained in the tiles of the tile list of a given amount.
    DamageTileListTest  
    DamageTileTest  
    MarkTargetList
    This effect deals markers to a player target list.
    MarkTargetListTest  
    MarkTile
    This effect marks all the players in the indicated tile.
    MarkTileList
    This effect add markers to players in the tile list.
    MarkTileListTest  
    MarkTileTest  
    MoveTarget
    This effect moves a single target to a new position.
    MoveTargetList
    This effect moves all the targets to a tile
    MoveTargetListTest  
    MoveTargetTest  
    ReloadTarget
    This effect reloads a weapon
    ReloadTargetTest  
    ReplaceAmmo
    This effect replaces ammo but its not used
    SortTile
    This effect sorts the tiles based on the current player tile
    SortTileTest
